description: This extension allows the user to build Claims summary in Podio easily just like famous sometimes Kiev Claims Specialist (He was almost Senior by the way) Mykola Levkiv (@infant_annihilator). Also I would to say thank you for @christina_zhurina (my Senior) that helped me with all that a/l's refund policy shit. I probably whould't done this plugin without her help
name: Summary builder
